name.ja: <ruby>蒼<rt>そう</rt></ruby><ruby>救<rt>きゅう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>照<rt>しょう</rt></ruby><ruby>覧<rt>らん</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Reveal 2 Warrior and/or Fairy Type monsters in your hand.

effect.en: Excavate the top 5 cards of your Deck. Add 1 excavated card to your hand. Then, place the remaining cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order. This turn, your Level 8 or lower monsters cannot attack, and your opponent takes no effect damage.

ja.set_name: Deck Mod Pack: Double Star of the Assault!!
